pcook01

Class Uber

  • java.lang.Object
    • pcook01.Uber

  • public class Uber
extends java.lang.Object
    Central class for Uber Application Responsible for handling ride requests, finding drivers and outputting Uber logs to a file
    Author:
    Patrick Cook

      • requestRide

        public static void requestRide(Passenger passenger,
                               Location dropoff)
        Allows a user to request a ride. Driver is found and the ride is started
        Parameters:
        passenger - - user requesting ride
        dropoff - - dropoff location for ride

      • rideConfirmation

        public static boolean rideConfirmation(Ride newRide,
                                       Driver driver,
                                       Passenger passenger)
        Determines whether the driver and passenger agree to the ride
        Parameters:
        newRide - - holds all ride information
        driver - - current selected driver
        passenger - - user requesting a ride
        Returns:
        Returns true if both parties confirm

      • getClosestDrivers

        public static java.util.PriorityQueue<Ride> getClosestDrivers(Passenger passenger,
                                                              Location dropoff)
        Algorithm for building a queue of drivers. Drivers who are closest to the passenger are given priority. If there is a tie the driver with the highest rating receives priority
        Parameters:
        passenger - - user requesting the ride
        dropoff - - dropoff location for the ride
        Returns:
        Returns a PriorityQueue of drivers to pick from

        public static void outputUberHistory()
        Used to output all trip history for the current run
